criterion: Suggests medication without proper evaluation of the user's pregnancy and asthma condition
Provides a list of safe medications for severe pregnancy asthma without any context or explanations
Asks the user for more information about their asthma symptoms to better understand their needs
Explains the importance of proper medication use during pregnancy and asthma exacerbations in clear and simple language
Instructs the user to consult their healthcare provider for personalized advice on managing severe pregnancy asthma
Fails to mention the potential risks of certain medications during pregnancy and asthma exacerbations
Provides a general overview of asthma management during pregnancy without considering the user's specific situation
Asks the user to clarify their understanding of their medication regimen to ensure proper use
Describes the importance of working closely with a healthcare provider to manage severe pregnancy asthma
Instructs the user to take their medication as prescribed and to report any changes in their condition to their healthcare provider
Fails to address the user's concern about frequent exacerbations of severe pregnancy asthma
